page.name: Module 4: Managing your pre-apprenticeship
page.content:
This module contains several resources to help you start thinking about your communications strategy and outcomes measurement. These two topics are connected — having a strong sense of your pre-apprenticeship program’s goals and outcomes will provide important data for you to incorporate into your communications. By the end of this module, you will: 

  • Be able to identify key program outcomes.
  • Understand how to articulate program inputs, outputs, and outcomes.
  • Understand how to communicate the benefits of your pre-apprenticeship program.
  • Understand different digital and in-person communications channels and measure the success of each.
